explains: n. 疫苗；（计算机）杀毒软件
wordGroup: hepatitis b vaccine n. 乙肝疫苗；乙型肝炎疫苗
inactivated vaccine [医]灭活疫苗，灭能疫苗
measles vaccine n. [免疫学]麻疹疫苗；麻疹
attenuated vaccine 减毒疫苗；致弱疫苗
smallpox vaccine 天花疫苗；牛痘苗；天花菌苗

sentences.en: At present, no widely approved vaccine exists for malaria.
sentences.cn: 目前没有被广泛认可的疟疾疫苗。

sentences.en: Researchers around the world are collaborating to develop a new vaccine.
sentences.cn: 世界各地的研究人员正在合作培育一种新的疫苗。

sentences.en: When he tested an early vaccine on himself, some described the act as foolhardy.
sentences.cn: 当他在自己身上试验还处于初级阶段的疫苗时，有些人说他的行为是莽撞的。
